AEP.nodeutilities

Class Storage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Storage

  • public class Storage
extends java.lang.Object
    The storage where all Items for which a particular node is responsible are stored

    • Field Summary

      private java.util.ArrayList<Item> db 
      private java.lang.String pathname

    • Constructor Detail

      • Storage

        public Storage(java.lang.String pathname)

    • Method Detail

      • initializeStorage

        public void initializeStorage(java.util.ArrayList<Item> initItems)

      • update

        public void update(int key,
                   java.lang.String value,
                   int version)
        updates an NodeUtilities.Item in the NodeUtilities.Storage, if already present, or adds it to the Storage if not. Items are stored in crescent order
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the NodeUtilities.Item
        value - the updated value of the NodeUtilities.Item
        version - the version number of the NodeUtilities.Item

      • removeItemsOutOfResponsibility

        public void removeItemsOutOfResponsibility(java.lang.Integer localNodeKey,
                                           Ring localNodeRing,
                                           java.lang.Integer N)
        This method iterates over every item in the storage and checks if the local node is not among the N replicas of a given item anymore
        Parameters:
        localNodeKey - the key of the current node
        localNodeRing - the Ring of the current node
        N - the number of Peers that must have a copy of an Item

      • getItem

        public Item getItem(int key)
        Gets a specific Item
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the NodeUtilities.Item
        Returns:
        the Item

      • getItemsForNewNode

        public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getItemsForNewNode(java.lang.Integer from,
                                                    java.lang.Integer to)
        Gets all the items excepts the ones with key that is inside the given range, with 'to' excluded.
        Parameters:
        from - the first integer, in crescent order, the Item key must be less or equal than
        to - the first integer, in crescent order, the Item key must be greater than
        Returns:
        the list of the Items the requesting node is responsible for

      • getStorage

        public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getStorage()
        Returns:
        the ArrayList representing the Storage

      • save

        private void save()
        saves the storage on a local text file

      • loadItems

        public boolean loadItems()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        load Items after a crash, when recovery is requested
        Returns:
        true if the operation has been correctly executed, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if no File is found in the predefined path
        java.io.IOException - if something goes wrong during the I/O operations
        java.lang.Exception - if local Storage is corrupted

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        overrides the java.lang.Object.toString() method, useful to manage the representation of the entire NodeUtilities.Storage
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
